Note.Q: In this world you will have trouble.
Note.P: GOD's PLAN - He created a PERFECT world.
Note.Q: God saw all that he had made, and it was very good.
Note.P: OUR PROBLEM - We have ABUSED our free will.

LI.Q: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.
We know that the whole creation has been groaning as in the pains of childbirth right up to the present time.

Note.P: GOD's PURPOSE - He wants to bring GOOD out of suffering.
Note.Q: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
Note.P: OUR PERSPECTIVE - We must think LONG term.
Note.Q: I consider that our present sufferings are not worth comparing with the glory that will be revealed in us.
No eye has seen, nor ear has heard, no mind has conceived what God has prepared for those who love him.
Note.P: GOD's DESIRE - He wants us to TURN TO him.
Note.Q: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.

LI.P: He gives us PEACE to deal with our present.
He gives us COURAGE to deal with our future.

Note.Q: I write these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you may know that you have eternal life.
